pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creates Adjacency Matrices for Lineage Searches // Creates and manages a provenance graph corresponding to the provenance created by the 'rdtLite' package, which collects provenance from R scripts. 'rdtLite' is available on CRAN. The provenance format is an extension of the W3C PROV JSON format (https://www.w3.org/Submission/2013/SUBM-prov-json-20130424/). The extended JSON provenance format is described in https://github.com/End-to-end-provenance/ExtendedProvJson.
